title: Teen in St. Louis claimed he was victim of drive-by attack, now admits he shot himself
content:
ST. LOUIS • A 15-year-old boy who claimed he was hurt in a drive-by shooting now admits he shot himself, police say.
The teen was shot in the hand at about 6:15 p.m. Tuesday in the 900 block of Cass Avenue.
Police say they went to a hospital to talk with the teen. He originally told officers that he was walking on 9th Street when a car passed him and its occupants opened fire.
Investigators say he later admitted that he had shot himself at a friend's home in the 900 block of Cass, in the Columbus Square neighborhood. The shooting is being classified as an accident.
